result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jordan Matthew Bayer

defendant.name: Bayer, Jordan Matthew

records.addlTxt: Confirmed zoom with Oshkosh CI for 11-9-2022 at 10:15 a.m.

Clerk: EZ. Defendant Jordan Matthew Bayer appeared by video, in custody from Oshkosh CI.  Attorney Timothy Drewa by Atty. Laykin Stone in court for Jordan Matthew Bayer.  Prosecuting attorney Stephanie L Hanson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives right to appear in person.  Defendant waives reading of the Information.  Not guilty plea entered to all counts.  Defendant requests to appear by zoom for next hearing and court grants same unless there is a disposition.
Hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Defendant transferred to Oshkosh CI and confirmed zoom for 10-24-2022

Clerk: EZ. Defendant Jordan Matthew Bayer appeared by telephone, in custody at DCI.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Jordan Matthew Bayer.  Prosecuting attorney Stephanie L Hanson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called at 10:18 a.m.  Only audio from DCI, video not working.  Atty. Drewa requests an adjournment to further discuss offer and hopeful to resolve at next hearing.  Defendant requests to appear remotely for next hearing and Court grants same.
Arraignment scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Arraignment on October 24, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Confirmed video with DCI, D's NOH mailed to DCI

Reset Arraignment from 9-19-2022 to on September 29, 2022 at 09:30 am to accommodate video appearance.
Confirmed video with DCI, D's NCH mailed to DCI
Arraignment on September 29, 2022 at 09:45 am-notice not mailed as correct time is 9:30 a.m.

Clerk: EZ. Prosecuting attorney Stephanie L Hanson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jordan Matthew Bayer not in court.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Jordan Matthew Bayer.   Atty. Drewa states defendant is at DCI and request video appearance and court grants.
Arraignment scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Clerk: EZ. Prosecuting attorney Mandy A. Schepper in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jordan Matthew Bayer in court, in custody.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Jordan Matthew Bayer. Preliminary hearing waived.  Court binds defendant over for trial and State shall file an Information.  Atty. Drewa states the defendant has been revoked and may be transferred to prison and would request video appearance and Court would allow video/zoom appearance.  Atty. Drewa request defendant be allowed to rescind his signature bond.  State opposes the request.  Court denies the request and the signature bond will remain as fixed.
Arraignment scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Take all medications as prescribed. Maintain absolute sobriety. Not possess or consume any controlled substance without valid prescription. Not possess any paraphernalia.

Prosecuting attorney Matthew Vincent Nugent in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jordan Matthew Bayer appeared by video, in custody from WCJ.   Attorney Wilfred P. de Junco in court for Jordan Matthew Bayer. Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found. SPD is unsure if defendant will qualify for SPD representation; Court sets $1500 sig bond. Preliminary hearing time limits waived. Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing. 
Court informs Defendant of DNA expungement rights.
Hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Initial appearance on May 27, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Prosecuting attorney Stephanie L Hanson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jordan Matthew Bayer not in court. Def in custody at Washington Co Jail but unable to participate or appear today due to illness. Court finds probable cause on complaint. Initial appearance adjourned to tomorrow before Comm. Maule.
Initial appearance scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Initial appearance on June 30, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
